column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I spent most of the afternoon gardening , and was close to covered with dirt .
#text=I reached a point that I was satisfied with , and decided to leave the rest of the work for the next day .
#text=After taking off my mud-encrusted boots , I tiptoed towards the bathroom , where I knew a relaxing bath was in my future .
#text=I drew the water as hot as I could , and quickly filled the tub halfway with water .
#text=I stripped my clothes , first taking off me pants , then my shirt , socks , and underwear .
#text=Two drops of lavender oil and two cups of epsom salt is what I put into the tub , balancing out the temperature with cold water until it was just perfect .
#text=I slowly dipped my foot into the tub , and found the feeling spectacular .
#text=I slowly sunk the rest of my body , and closed my eyes in a breath of sweet relief .
